description:
The donut store near the Eagle Jump office is having a store-wide 50% off sale. So naturally, everyone shows up to office with boxes of donuts, and it`s time for a donut party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Full-time Employment Is a Loophole in the Law to Make Wages Lower
Le vide juridique de la nouvelle loi permet de baisser le salaire de ses employés à temps plein ?
Seishaintte Okyuuryou o Yasuku Suru Tame no Hou no Nukeana...
正社員ってお給料を安くするための法の抜け穴...
正職員工是為了把薪水壓低的法律漏洞嗎…
